fields.name: Name
fields.description: If resource type is dimension, this must be either ResourceGroupName or SubscriptionId. If resource type is tag, this must be a valid Azure tag

fields.name: PolicyType
fields.description: Method of cost allocation for the rule

fields.name: ResourceType
fields.description: Type of resources contained in this cost allocation rule

fields.name: Values
fields.description: Target resources for cost allocation. This list cannot contain more than 25 values.
